Rule.Condition: ISNULLOREMPTY(FACT(FCountryCode)) OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "AL" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "AT" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "BY" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "BE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "BA" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "BG" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "HR" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "CY" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "CZ" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "DK" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "EE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "FO" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "FI" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "FR" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "DE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "GI" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "GR" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "GG" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "HU" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "IS" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "IE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "IM" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "IT" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "JE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "LV" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "LI" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "LT" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "LU" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "MK" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "MT" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "MD" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "MC" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "ME" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "NL" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "NO" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "PL" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "PT" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "RO" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "SM" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "RS" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "SK" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "SI" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "ES" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "SJ" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "SE" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "CH" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "UA" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "UK" OR FACT(FCountryCode) != "VA"

Actions.EvaluateMessage: "Registering a .EU domain name requires the registrant contact country to be from European Union."
